item.title: [317] Stall Problems [317]
item.dc:creator: @The_Provoked The Provoked
item.description:
@The_Provoked wrote:

I have been tampering with my stalls because it took ages just to get to 50 thieving, and plus 25k at a time just didn’t cut it, so I go and change the xp rates and the amount of money you get from them each time, and how fast you can steal, and everything works EXCEPT the amount of money you get from each stall. I am supposed to get 50k from silk stall, 100k from silver stall, and 250k from gem stall. If anyone could explain this and help me fix it, that would be great.

if(objectID == 2562){ TheifStall("gem stall", "and receive 250,000 gold.", 80, 7000*playerLevel[17], 995, 250000, 0x340); } if(objectID == 2560){ TheifStall("silk stall", "and receive 50,000 gold.", 1, 600*playerLevel[17], 995, 50000, 0x340); } if(objectID == 2565){ TheifStall("silver stall", "and receive 100,000 gold.", 50, 1050*playerLevel[17], 995, 100000, 0x340); }

thats it!

Read full topic
